housing.title: Housing & Property
housing.description: Support for housing schemes, new home allotments, property tax, building permits and property registration.
steps: Open Services → Housing
Apply to housing schemes (e.g. PMAY) and complete eligibility assessment
Submit online application and upload required documents (ID, income proof, residence proof, photos)
Pay any applicable fees or link bank details for subsidies
Apply for property tax payments and view receipts
Request building permits, approvals and occupancy certificates when required
Register property or book appointment for e-registration
Track all housing-related applications via Profile → Applications or the Unified Application Tracker
Escalate grievances for delayed applications

schemes.title: Housing Schemes Applications
tasks: Eligibility assessment for urban and rural housing schemes
Online application submission with document upload
Application status tracking from submission to house allotment
Subsidy status tracking and disbursement updates

propertyTax.title: Property Tax Services
tasks: Property tax calculation based on municipal rates
Digital payment via UPI, net banking, or cards
Tax exemption applications for senior citizens/disabled

permits.title: Building Permits & Approvals
tasks: Track approval status with different departments

registration.title: Property Registration
tasks: Stamp duty and registration fee calculation

tracking.title: Application Tracking
tasks: Real-time status of all housing-related applications

utilities.title: Utilities (Water / Electricity / Gas)
utilities.description: Apply for new connections, manage billing and report outages or meter issues.
steps: Open Services → Utilities
Select the service: New connection / Bill payment / Complaint
For new connections, fill property details and upload ownership/residence proof
For billing issues, provide meter number and attach a photo of the bill
Submit and note the reference number; use it to follow up via Profile → Applications or Track page

health.title: Health Services
health.description: Locate government health facilities, book appointments and access schemes like Ayushman Bharat.
steps: Open Services → Health
Use the facility locator to find nearby government health centers or hospitals
Select service: appointment booking, scheme registration, or medical records
Provide patient details and upload any required documents
Confirm booking/submission and save the reference ID for tracking

education.title: Education
education.description: Apply for school admissions, scholarships and access learning resources provided by government portals.
steps: Open Services → Education
Choose: Admissions / Scholarships / Learning Resources
For admissions, fill student and guardian details and upload required certificates
For scholarships, check eligibility, fill the application and upload proofs
Submit and note application ID; track status via Profile → Applications

employment.title: Employment & Training
employment.description: Find government job listings, apply for training programs and register for employment exchanges.
steps: Open Services → Employment
Browse jobs or training programs and check eligibility requirements
Register or sign-in to the relevant portal (e.g. Skill India, state employment exchange)
Upload resume and supporting documents where required
Submit application and save reference/application IDs to track progress

financial-assistance.title: Financial Assistance
financial-assistance.description: Apply for pensions, subsidies, direct benefit transfers and other government aid programs.
steps: Open Services → Financial Assistance
Select the specific scheme to apply for and read eligibility criteria
Gather required documents (ID, income certificate, bank details)
Complete and submit the online application
Note the application ID and monitor beneficiary/payment status under Profile
